text: == Classification == {| align=center style="font-size: 90%; border- collapse:collapse" border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=2 |- align=center bgcolor=#98A1B2 !width=40| !width=220|Season ranking 1960 !width=55|Pt !width=40|G !width=40|W !width=40|D !width=40|L !width=40|PF !width=40|PA |- align=center style="background:#DDEEFF" | 1. ||style="text-align:left;"| OKK Beograd ||28||18||14||0||4||1565||1278 |- align=center | 2. ||style="text- align:left;"| Olimpija ||26||18||13||0||5||1318||1151 |- align=center | 3. ||style="text-align:left;"| Zadar ||20||18||9||2||7||1275||1256 |- align=center | 4. ||style="text-align:left;"| Partizan ||19||18||9||1||8||1318||1324 |- align=center | 5. ||style="text-align:left;"| Željezničar Karlovac ||17||18||8||1||9||1225||1263 |- align=center | 6. ||style="text-align:left;"| Crvena Zvezda ||14||18||7||0||11||1275||1285 |- align=center | 7. ||style="text-align:left;"| Radnički Belgrade ||14||18||7||0||11||1024||1110 |- align=center | 8. ||style="text- align:left;"| Sloboda Tuzla ||14||18||7||0||11||1000||1128 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 9. ||style="text-align:left;"| Proleter Zrenjanin ||14||18||7||0||11||1160||1296 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 10. ||style="text-align:left;"| Ljubljana ||13 (-1)||18||7||0||11||1128||1197 |} The winning roster of OKK Beograd: * Miodrag Nikolić * Slobodan Gordić * Radivoj Korać * Dušan Gajin * Trajko Rajković * Slobodan Miloradović * Ljubomir Lucić * Frane Bosiočić * Bogomir Rajković * Bruno Pavelić * Milan Tošić * Milorad Erkić * Branko Kosović * Vojislav Jovanović Coach: Borislav Stanković ==Scoring leaders== # Radivoj Korać (OKK Beograd) – ___ points (37.0 ppg) # ??? # ??? == Qualification in 1960-61 season European competitions == FIBA European Champions Cup * OKK Beograd (Champions) ==References== Category:Yugoslav First Basketball League seasons
title: 1960 Yugoslav First Basketball League
